    right="Feat 2"

>
[Amphibious Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=2895) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 68 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon adapts to life on land and underwater. It gains the [amphibious](/Traits.aspx?ID=207) trait, allowing it to breathe in water and air and to avoid the normal –2 penalty for making bludgeoning and slashing unarmed Strikes underwater. It gains a swim Speed equal to its land Speed or 25 feet, whichever is less; or if it is normally [aquatic](/Traits.aspx?ID=168), it gains a land Speed equal to its swim Speed or 25 feet, whichever is less.
name: Amphibious Form
